title: Augmented Reality-Based Public Safety Training: Large-Scale Incident Response Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental first aid knowledge and understanding of public safety principles
context.additional_context: A corporate-level safety training program to strengthen employees' on-site response capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can apply SALT (Sort, Assess, Life-saving, Treatment/Transport) triage techniques at large-scale accident sites through AR simulation with 80% accuracy
Learners can improve decision-making speed by 20% for three or more crisis scenario simulations in AR environments
Learners can achieve 75 points or higher in situational awareness during actual training evaluations based on knowledge acquired in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
